member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITesting.CodedUITestAttribute
member.summary: Specifies that the method to which this attribute applies can be edited and played back by the coded UI testing framework.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITesting.CodedUITestAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITesting.CodedUITestAttribute.ExtensionId
member.summary: Gets the universal resource indicator (URI) for the coded UI test.
member.returns: the universal resource identifier (URI) for the Coded UI Test.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITesting.CodedUITestAttribute.GetClientSide
member.summary: Returns an object that represents the client side of the Coded UI Test.
member.returns: An object that represents the client side of the coded UI test.

member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UITesting.CodedUITestAttribute.GetExecution
member.summary: Returns an object that implements events for unit test events.
member.returns: An object that implements events for unit test events.
